dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5756 IH: To require the Securities and Exchange Commission to adjust certain resubmission thresholds for shareholder proposals.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Duffy introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To require the Securities and Exchange Commission to adjust certain resubmission thresholds for shareholder proposals.

section.text: The Securities and Exchange Commission shall revise section 240.14a–8(i)(12) of title 17, Code of Federal Regulations to—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (i), adjust the 3 percent threshold to 6 percent;
in paragraph (ii), adjust the 6 percent threshold to 15 percent; and
in paragraph (iii), adjust the 10 percent threshold to 30 percent.
